newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU clears Walt Disney/News Corp venture - EU source.
newsitem.headline: EU clears Walt Disney/News Corp venture - EU source.

text.p: The European Commission has cleared the proposed joint venture between ESPN Inc, a subsidiary of Walt Disney Co, and Star Television Ltd, which belongs to News International Plc, a European Union source said on Tuesday.
The joint venture, to be called NEWCO, would pool all the assets and licences of ESPN's and Star Television's Asian non-standard sports television distribution businesses.
The operation was submitted to the Commission for clearance on October 9 under the EU's merger rules.
